# IMarshalStreamProcessor.Process method

Processes bytes being read or written to a [`MarshalStream`](../MarshalStream.md) instance.

```csharp
public void Process(ReadOnlySpan<byte> bytes)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| bytes | The bytes being processed. |

## Remarks

If this method throws an exception, the state of the [`MarshalStream`](../MarshalStream.md) will be corrupted and invalid.
